column5: Would Be Perfect in Super High Rise!
column6:
These are my favorite leggings for sweaty workouts!
For reference, I'm 5'2, with a 24.5in waist and 39in hips. I buy a size four in all my lulu leggings, and they fit perfectly! Even though these are supposed to be ankle length, I still have them hemmed an inch to the perfect length for me. They don't pill and hold up really well whether I'm lifting or running. My only complaint is that I like my leggings really high, and since the luxtreme is so compressive these tend to not stay as high on my waist as when I first pull them on. They're the same rise as the aligns (and the rise on the aligns is perfect so I know it's the fabric that's causing the difference), for example, but because this fabric is designed to suck you in it wants to stay compressed and therefore not stay high on my waist when I pull them up. To be clear, they aren't slipping down in the crotch! They just become more of a low high rise after I move around in them. So It's not an issue with the leggings themselves, I just wish lulu would make the luxtreme wunder under in super high rise like they do the luon wunder unders and aligns! Then these would be truly perfect.
